title: Laracasts - Jan. 21 - Gulp This
description:
There are a number of task runners these days, with Grunt resting at the top of the food chain. However, I think that's going to change quickly, after the introduction of Gulp. Gulp is the build tool you've been hoping for.

In this lesson, we'll review the basic process, using a CSS task as an example. We'll handle Sass compilation, auto-prefixing, minification, exporting, and more. However, in a follow-up lesson, we'll focus specifically on creating the perfect Gulp file for our Laravel applications.
